<code>
    td.quote a[href^="http://www.mediafire.com"] {
    -khtml-user-select: none;

    -o-user-select: none;

    background-clip: padding-box;
    background-color: #83B842;
    background-image: linear-gradient(top,#83b842,#629721);
    border: 1px solid #468000;
    border-image: initial;
    box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.4), inset 0 0 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.2), 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);

    padding: 12px 15px;
    position: relative;
    text-align: center;

    text-overflow: ellipsis;

    width: 497px;
